Reviews.Title: Nokia pre paid cell phone  2760
Reviews.Author: Lainiep12
Reviews.Content: July 2, 2012Today  I received  my  new, in the orginal box, Nokia pre paid cell phone  2760. It came exactly as  described on Amazon. com, everything  included in an orginal unopened box. I've had this model phone before, and I loved it! I can't believe that I was able to find an exact replacement and in Perfect condition! Thanks to my seller  David_Store. His product was as described, shipped as stated and I received  it on 7/2/12 in perfect condition.  My thanks to David_Store. Anyone interested in any of his products  will be very happy with the products  and service that he  extends. #1 Seller  for  me, I'll look again at his products advertised on Amazon.com.thanks againNokia Handset w/ VGA CameraLainiep12

Reviews.Title: T-Mobile phone ,  "NOT" !
Reviews.Author: miguel a. menchaca
Reviews.Content: It doesnt matter what they say.  The ones I bought it from are "LYING"  . It is Not a T-Mobile phone ,it came "locked" and T-Mobile says it is NOT a T-Mobile phone.  Needless to say , I cant use it

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: george kong
Reviews.Content: I love it.The phone is new. The shippinG was fast. I would recommend this phone to anYone looking for a nice and working phone. In addition, the batTEry longs many days.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: 23milton
Reviews.Content: this product was definitely worth its price. got it for my mom and she loves the simplicity of it. evrything in this product is just as the description truly says so dont worry about it being a fake or knock-off

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: 11doctor
Reviews.Content: I had the original basic Nokia T Mobile prepaid phone. This phone is a nice upgrade and works well. The camera takes decent pics. The price is a great deal. The other review was based on delivery not the actual phone.

Reviews.Title: never received it. they delivered and left it outside because i was not home and someone stole it.
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Sebastian
Reviews.Content: When you sell merchandise to the public you need to make sure you pick someone RESPONSIBLE to DELIVER  your products.  When you pick delivery companies and people that leave valuable mercahndise that is paid for on people's doorsteps or outside you cannot possibly think that package is going to get to the rightful owner!  What a dissappointment!  I could not recover my property no matter how hard i tried.  To fix this error and make the party responsible for this error to reimburse me will never happen. No matter who I talked to each person tried to put the blame on the other. You should tell the company you  hire to do your deliveries NOT TO EVER EVER leave merchandise outside the person's door. It is your mistake for hiring these people to do your deliveries.  It is your responsiblility to make sure the products your customers order from you get to them!!! I dont think i will ever order anything online again because of this. Thanks for NOTHING !

ProductInfo.Features:
Camera with video capture
Bluetooth Connectivity, Bluetooth included
Instant messaging
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 2760 T-Mobile Prepaid Phone with Handsfree Headset
